project.name: d3web-Verbalizer
project.description:
Creation Context: d3web (general) Coders: Florian Lemmerich Supervisor: JoBa
Short: Verbalization (Rendering to String Representation) of an object Long: This project contains an easily expandable framework for the rendering of arbitrary objects to strings. It includes some Verbalizers for basic (d3web-Kernel) classes. Mainly, the framework consists of:
- The Verbalizer interface for all current and future verbalizers - The VerbalizationManager which registers verbalizers and delegates a given object to a appropriate verbalizer - Some basic (and exemplary) verbalizers for key-classes of the Kernel
